mapper.select: SELECT hi.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM house_deal WHERE house_deal.apt_seq = hi.apt_seq) AS deal_cnt, (SELECT FORMAT(ROUND(AVG(CAST(REPLACE(deal_amount, ',', '') AS DOUBLE)), 1), 0) FROM house_deal WHERE house_deal.apt_seq = hi.apt_seq) AS avg_deal_amount FROM favorite_house AS fs JOIN house_info AS hi ON fs.apt_seq = hi.apt_seq WHERE fs.user_seq = #{userSeq};
SELECT DISTINCT fs.dong_code, dc.sido_name, dc.gugun_name, dc.bdong_name AS dong_name FROM favorite_spot AS fs JOIN dong_code AS dc ON fs.dong_code = dc.bdong_code WHERE fs.user_seq = #{userSeq};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO custom_spot(spot_name, jibun, road_nm, latitude, longitude, user_seq) VALUES(#{customSpot.spotName}, #{customSpot.jibun}, #{customSpot.roadNm}, #{customSpot.latitude}, #{customSpot.longitude}, #{userSeq})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM custom_spot WHERE user_seq = #{userSeq} AND spot_seq = #{customSeq}
